page.title: 08HOUSING FOR THE ELDERLY.
page.content: In Leyburn there are a number of types of housing which have been provided especially for those people over the age of sixty years. In Woodside there bungalows which are connected by telephone to a {Warden's {house.}The residents can ask for help when they need it. The people living in these houses are mainly in good health _ able to look after themselves. There is a {private residential home} for the elderly in St.Matthew's Terrace. This is for old people who are not able to look after themselves and who can afford to pay to be looked after. At Quarry Hills House there is an old people's home where people who cannot look after themselves are cared for. This is run by the {Local Authority.}
